p: Among the most abundant compounds, particular attention was paid to Î±-pinene, as it always reached higher percentages in the vapor phase than in the liquid phase of the investigated EOs. The compared values are as follows: (44.0% vs. 65.6%), (16.6% vs. 31.6%), (20.2% vs. 35.5%), and (30.8% vs. 51.3%) liquid and vapor phase in P. cembra, P. mugo, P. abies, and A. alba EOs, respectively ( Figure 1).
